Department:
Overview: This report provides the Spring 2025 student-faculty ratios by department across all colleges and schools at the university. It shows the number of full-time and part-time faculty, their instructional loads, total full-time equivalent (FTE) faculty, the number of FTE students, and the resulting student-to-faculty ratios.

Abbreviations:

FTE (Full-Time Equivalent): A measure that combines full-time and part-time faculty or students into a standardized full-time count.

FT (Full-time Faculty): Faculty members employed full-time by the university.

Load Credits: Teaching or instructional credits assigned to faculty, representing teaching workload.
